snippet.title: Planet Zoo: Barnyard Animal Pack | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Experience the charm of the countryside in Planet Zoo: Barnyard Animal Pack!

Wishlist Here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2837730/Planet_Zoo_Barnyard_Animal_Pack

Packed with personality and character, this collection includes the adventurous Alpine goat, known for its nimble hooves and indomitable spirit, the Sussex chicken with its energetic demeanour, and the sweet and curious alpaca.   

Alongside these exciting new additions, the pack also features 30+ rustic scenery pieces along with a new campaign scenario in which much loved characters return to transform a run-down farm into a successful animal haven for both your animals and guests to enjoy.  

For more news and information about Planet Zoo: Website: www.planetzoogame.com  
Facebook: www.facebook.com/PlanetZooGame   
Twitter: @PlanetZooGame 
Instagram: @PlanetZooGame 

Planet Zoo © 2024 Frontier Developments plc. All rights reserved.
